Summary: Multiple flying orange-ish orbs flying across the sky..
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Woonsocket
There were no other sightings in Woonsocket on or around July 4th 2012
Object Shape: Circle, Disc, Egg, Flash, Oval, Sphere, Star-like
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting at home watching fireworks out of my window, and then I saw a small orange orb fly slowly across the sky. Soon after, another came, I've seen eight SO FAR, and they appear to be changing shape, multiplying, changing speed and directions, and glowing at different intensities.
